CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 10 Figure 3 shows the cyclic voltammogram of PCZDTB and PQCDTB , which were measured in 0.1 M tetrabutylammoniumhexafluorophosphate acetonitrile.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCZDTB |
| PQCDTB |
| tetrabutylammoniumhexafluorophosphate |
| acetonitrile |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCZDTB |
| PQCDTB |
| tetrabutylammonium hexafluorophosphate |
| acetonitrile |

Explanation:

* "Figure 3" and "which were measured" are not material names.
* "in 0.1 M" is a quantity and not a material name.
* "tetrabutylammoniumhexafluorophosphate" is a material name.
* "acetonitrile" is a material name.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 10 Figure 3 shows the cyclic voltammogram of PCZDTB and PQCDTB , which were measured in 0.1 M tetrabutylammoniumhexafluorophosphate acetonitrile.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| ------------ |
| Figure 3 |
| PCZDTB |
| PQCDTB |
| 0.1 M tetrabutylammoniumhexafluorophosphate |
| acetonitrile |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| ------------ |
| Figure 3 |
| PCZDTB |
| PQCDTB |
| 0.1 M tetrabutylammoniumhexafluorophosphate |
| acetonitrile (solvent) |

Note: "Figure 3" and the named compounds (PCZDTB and PQCDTB) are considered material properties as they are the subjects of the sentence. "Acetonitrile" is included as a solvent used in the measurement of the material properties.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 10 Figure 3 shows the cyclic voltammogram of PCZDTB and PQCDTB , which were measured in 0.1 M tetrabutylammoniumhexafluorophosphate acetonitrile.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Figure 3 |
| PCZDTB |
| PQCDTB |
| 0.1 M tetrabutylammoniumhexafluorophosphate |
| acetonitrile |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 0.1 M tetrabutylammoniumhexafluorophosphate |
| acetonitrile |
| PCZDTB |
| PQCDTB |

[Explanation: "Figure 3" is not a material property, it is a figure or graph. "Which were measured" is not a material property, it is a description of an action. "In 0.1 M tetrabutylammoniumhexafluorophosphate acetonitrile" is describing the solution in which the measurement was taken, but "0.1 M tetrabutylammoniumhexafluorophosphate" and "acetonitrile" are the material properties being measured.]
